Text: The Fat Cat Brewery is a brewery located at the "Fat Cat Brewery Tap", Lawson Road, Norwich in the English county of Norfolk.

--------------------
Text: Fat Cat Brewery:  The brewery is owned by Colin Keatley landlord of the "Fat Cat" public house twice winner of the CAMRA National Pub of the Year.
